p: The PCR consisted of a 25-μL reaction mixture containing 2 μL of the DNA solution, 1x PCR reaction buffer, 0.2 mM of dNTP mixture, 0.2 μM of each forward and reverse primers ( Table 5), 1.5 mM of MgCl 2 and 1 U of Platinum Taq DNA Polymerase (Invitrogen, Carlsbad, CA, USA). The program comprised of one initial denaturation step at 94 °C for 3 min, followed by 35 cycles at 94 °C for 30 s, X °C for 30 s, and 72 °C for X s (see Table 5 for annealing temperature and extension time).
